con:testCase.name: Test Case-DEV-Invalidate-Settings
con:testCase.con:description:
https://www.sg.de.o2.com/jira/browse/DRC-3648
As QA I want to implement tests only for manual execution before release like tests for logging or wss-security to coverage GUI-Service:
invalidateAll for
group: SETTINGS
Note! Because settings on DEV must be tested for releases, implemented test-case must be disabled for regression tests. Implemented test-case must be executed each time one new release candidate together with tests for logging or ws-security.
Followed settings group must be changed:
Change values with setSettings-methode or in DB for followed SETTINGS group: Change any setting like address from finance department. Url from one ENDPOINT on the end like: com.o2.directrecharge.adapter.ppit.PpitSettings.PPIT_CUSTOMERCARE_ENDPOINT com.o2.directrecharge.adapter.mipay.MipaySettings.MIPAY_AUTOTOPUP_ENDPOINT One change URL for VOMS (Corba) One change for MFT (Oleg: have to send SQL-Script for changes) One change for Job in DB (set to inactive) One change for WebService like com.o2.directrecharge.service.WebService.SUBSCRIPTION_MANAGEMENT_SERVICE, Set active=false.
For change settings followed test-steps must be implemented:
Prereq: call healtyCheck with http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8280/drc/ws/PlainDrcGuiService. Make sure all services are running and accessible Save all setting-values in getSettings - Response. Read setings with service: getSettingChildNodes like in test-case: TestSuite-DEV-DATQIT --> TestCase-DEV-SFTP-UploadQIT Change settings with methods in followed order if not possible to change with one of them: with GUI-Service: setSettings directly in db in tables with script from Oleg (Order script, if not delivered yet) Call healtyCheck with http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8280/drc/ws/PlainDrcGuiService. Make sure changed services are running and accessible. Exec Invalidation. Call healtyCheck with http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8280/drc/ws/PlainDrcGuiService. Make sure changed services are not accessible any more. Restore all settings to value before test started. Call healtyCheck with http://mucsgdp08.sg.de.pri.o2.com:8280/drc/ws/PlainDrcGuiService. Make sure all services are running and accessible Verify changed settings set back to old value with method: getSettingChildNodes
Acceptance criteria:
Present current values from settings before test-execution in review meeting. Exec implemented tests step by step and view changes. Exec invalidation and view changed settings. Set all settings value back and view restored values.

con:elements.con:expectedValue: Oracle Database 12c Enterprise Edition Release 12.2.0.1.0 - 64bit Production
